# Government Contract Tender Announcement

## Contract Overview

- **Contract Reference Number**: PW-22-01012052

- **Title**: Refrigerated Programmable Benchtop Centrifuge

## Contract Details

- **Estimated Contract Value**: N/A (Quantity of commodity: 1)

- **Scope of Work**: Supply and delivery of a refrigerated programmable benchtop centrifuge

## Supporting Documents
